Hi everyone! I am trying to figure out how to add *optional* sections/modules to email templates (so that my client could choose to turn a specific section on or off when creating a new email). I found this info, but cannot seem to find anything on how to actually implement optional sections! <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Email-Marketing-Tool/Variable-Number-of-Modules-in-Email-Template/m-p/258191/highlight/false#M2666> (edited)

1. You would need to first create a module that is for email templates. 
2) Then you would add your fields into the module.
3) you would then add a booleon field that asks if you will be using the module
4) inside your code you would `{% if module.field == true %}` and wrap your code inside that
